content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for considering my apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what your budget is for a 25-square-meter apartment in Mannheim?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 400 Euros per month.

I am looking for a cheap option.

I hope you can make it happen.

I am a student, so I have a limited budget.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I will pay on time and take good care of the apartment.

I am open to negotiate with you.

Please let me know your proposal.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for sharing your budget, Maria. I understand that you are looking for a more affordable option and I appreciate your willingness to be a good tenant.

Based on the size and location of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 350 Euros per month. This price is competitive for a 25-square-meter apartment in Mannheim and takes into consideration the costs of utilities and maintenance.

I am open to negotiating further if you have any concerns or suggestions. Please let me know if you have any questions or if there is anything else I can do to assist you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month.

Thank you very much for your proposal.

I am excited to move into this apartment.

I will pay on time and take good care of the apartment.

I appreciate your help and support in finding a suitable apartment for my needs.

Could you please provide me with the lease agreement and any other necessary documents?

Thank you again.

Best regards,

Maria Mamani
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you, Maria, for accepting my proposal. I am glad to hear that you are excited to move into the apartment.

I will prepare the lease agreement and any other necessary documents for you to review and sign. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the agreement or if there is anything else I can do to assist you.

Once the lease agreement is signed, you can move into the apartment and start paying the monthly rent of 350 Euros. I appreciate your commitment to being a good tenant and paying on time.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I look forward to working with you and welcoming you as my new tenant.

Best regards,

Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
